about_the_game:
Welcome to Party Universe, an epic multiplayer bonanza that whisks you and your friends away to a realm brimming with excitement, laughter, and adventure! Race, compete, hunt with maximum 10 other players, Party Universe is the ideal destination for a memorable gaming night with your favorite buddies.

Our playground has different game modes:

  • Prop Hunt: Hunt your friends in a race against time or, if you like to hide, find a nice spot to hide and be quiet!
  • More soon

Party Universe's immersive gameplay, and energetic soundtrack converge to create a captivating experience that keeps you and your friends coming back for more.

Whether you're organizing an unforgettable game night, seeking a bonding experience with friends, or simply craving a challenge that hones your skills and camaraderie, Party Universe is your go-to destination for an unparalleled multiplayer journey.

Stay connected with your gaming community through integrated social features, including in-game chat. Share your achievements, engage in friendly banter, and cultivate lasting friendships in our ever-expanding universe.

So, gather your crew and embark on a cosmic quest filled with laughter, teamwork, and friendly competition. The stars are the limit in Party Universe! 🚀✨🎮

name: Party Universe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 (DirectX-11 compliant with 1GB of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (or GTX 760 / GTX 960) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (or R9 280x [2GB VRAM] / R9 380 / Fury X)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card 5.1 with latest drivers

short_description: Party Universe invites you to a cosmic celebration of friendship and competition! Gather your crew and embark on adrenaline-pumping adventures across a galaxy of fun. Unleash your teamwork skills and outshine your rivals in this ultimate multiplayer experience!
